description: Random or thematic crossword games generated by users for users
name: Crosswords

description: A classic word guessing game where players have to find the hidden word based on randomly disclosed letters
name: Hangman

name: Letter Bind

name: Sudoku

description: A variation of the classic Snake game
name: Snaking

description: A twist of an emblematic Taito fixed-shooter game from 1978
name: Space Battle

description: Based on the original russian Tetris game
name: Retris

description: A Chinese puzzle made up of seven shapes that can be arranged to form many different designs
name: Tangram
